00029 /* Creation flags. */
00030 #define T_FPU     XNFPU
00031 #define T_SUSP    XNSUSP
00032 /* <!> High bits must not conflict with XNFPU|XNSHADOW|XNSHIELD|XNSUSP. */
00033 #define T_CPU(cpu) (1 << (24 + (cpu & 0xff))) /* Up to 8 cpus [0-7] */
00034 
00035 /* Status/mode flags. */
00036 #define T_BLOCKED XNPEND
00037 #define T_DELAYED XNDELAY
00038 #define T_READY   XNREADY
00039 #define T_DORMANT XNDORMANT
00040 #define T_STARTED XNSTARTED
00041 #define T_BOOST   XNBOOST
00042 #define T_LOCK    XNLOCK
00043 #define T_RRB     XNRRB
00044 #define T_NOSIG   XNASDI
00045 #define T_SHIELD  XNSHIELD

00050 #define T_HOOK_DELETE XNHOOK_THREAD_DELETE
00051 #define T_DESC(cookie) thread2rtask(cookie)

00055 #define T_HIPRIO  FUSION_HIGH_PRIO

00101

00128 static inline RT_TASK *thread2rtask (xnthread_t *t)
00129 {
00130     return t ? ((RT_TASK *)(((char *)(t)) - (int)(&((RT_TASK *)0)->thread_base))) : NULL;
00131 }
